title: Data Leak Prevention solutions
extract: Data leakage prevention solutions from Mimecast. ... Mimecast provides email security, continuity and archiving solutions in a cloud-based subscription service. Mimecast's email security services include data leakage prevention solutions that are simple to implement, easy to manage and highly effective at stopping leaks.
